content: so I cannot complete that process.
<@568257600228032512> when you are back on can you help
Hi <@1279970871162835079> can you tell me what happens when you try to add your phone number?
yes it won't let me nit the next button
I even added dashes in between the numbers
is this a 10 digit mobile number? is it landline? or VOIP (Google Voice)?
yep. 10 digits. yeah my Google voice. I use it for most things
I don't think discord will allow Google voice or any voip number.
Hi <@1279970871162835079> VOIP is not accepted for verification.
Discord wants a mobile phone number as verification. Consider that anyone can make 1000s of Google Voice numbers, so not really improving security.

Hi I saw this requirement as well.  My question is if our phone number is already part of our discord account profile.  Will that be sufficient, or is this a separate process? I’m not seeing where to go based on the written instructions.  Also I’m on mobile.
Hi <@392108353997766659> you don’t need to do anything if you already have a phone number on your discord profile.
